description:
- Short Christmas Coat "A short, roomy coat. "
 - Kid's Short Christmas Coat "A children's short, roomy coat. "
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it. 
 - Black Bear Newsboy Cap "A warm, lumpy newsboy cap with bear ears on it. "
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
name: Short Christmas Coat Set
